text: Contradictions Collapse is the first album by Swedish heavy metal band Meshuggah. The album was released on May 1, 1991 by the band's record label, Nuclear Blast. The album was first named (All This Because of) Greed, but the band changed it before it was released. It was released again as a compact disc in 1998. == Track listing == == References == Category:1991 albums Category:Meshuggah albums Category:Nuclear Blast albums
title: Contradictions Collapse
